com.clarionmedia.infinitum.rest

Class RestfulTypeAdapter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.rest.RestfulTypeAdapter<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TypeAdapter<T>

    public abstract class RestfulTypeAdapter<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements TypeAdapter<T>

    Facilitates the mapping of Java data types to RESTful web service resource fields.

    Version:
    1.0 03/21/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

        public abstract void mapToField(T value,

              java.util.List<NameValuePair> pairs)
        Maps the given value to the given web service form field.
        Parameters:
        value - the value being mapped
        field - the form field being mapped to
        pairs - NameValuePairs containing the data mappings for the model
